collaboration_patterns.title: Security-First Activation Sequence
collaboration_patterns.description: Optimal agent activation order for security-sensitive features
collaboration_patterns.context: Authentication, authorization, payment processing, sensitive data

anti_patterns.title: Late Security Review
anti_patterns.description: Activating security specialist after implementation is complete
anti_patterns.better_approach: Activate security specialist during design phase
anti_patterns.prevention: Mandatory security activation for sensitive features

optimization_insights.title: Performance-DevOps Collaboration Pattern
optimization_insights.description: Coordinated approach between performance and infrastructure specialists
optimization_insights.pattern: @performance-specialist identifies bottlenecks → @devops-specialist implements infrastructure solutions → joint validation
